commitMessage:
refactor: simplify ion-textarea height approach without \!important

- Use flex: 1 1 auto instead of complex height constraints
- Set min-height: 200px for consistent baseline size
- Remove \!important declarations for cleaner CSS
- Add ionic custom properties --min-height and --max-height
- Keep native textarea overflow: unset for scrolling functionality
